categories: Classic Short Waterproof Arctic Grip Boots
description: Comfy, warm and ready for winter. These boots take UGG’s classic design and add some serious weatherproofing, using waterproof leather and Vibram’s Arctic Ice tread. The technical rubber outsole keeps you surefooted on slick, icy terrain, while UGG’s rich sheepskin interior keeps your feet warm and cozy.Vibram Arctic Grip™ outsole provides incredible traction on wet ice. Aggressive tread pattern and deep lugs provide traction everywhere else.Made from waterproof suede.Seam-sealed construction keeps your feet dry.Soft sheepskin lining.Treadlite midsole offers support and all-day comfort.This product was made in a factory that supports women in the UGG™ supply chain with the help of HERproject, a collaborative initiative that creates partnerships with brands like UGG to empower and educate women in the workplace.
name: UGG Classic Short Waterproof Arctic Grip Boots - Women's
